headline: Workday Expands to Meet Enterprise Needs in Asia Pacific
summary: SYDNEY, October 23, 2025--Companies across Asia Pacific are adopting Workday solutions to modernize their technology stacks and stay competitive in changing markets, ISG says.

raw.headline: Workday Expands to Meet Enterprise Needs in Asia Pacific

headline: Workday CEO talks new AI model tools for businesses
summary: Business manager platform Workday (WDAY) is launching a new suite of agentic AI models in a bid to better compete with artificial intelligence developer OpenAI's (OPAI.PVT) growing toolbox of artificial intelligence applications. Workday CEO Carl Eschenbach sits down with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman and Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi to talk more about the platform's new AI tools and its deployment amid growing concerns around AI replacing workers. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Workday Doubles Down on AI
summary: Business software giant Workday is betting big on AI to win over new customers rolling out its own artificial agents and tools for developers to build their own. The stock's struggled this year, but CEO Carl Eschenbach says the market's missing the story. He joined Bloomberg Open Interest to talk about Workday's AI push.

headline: Workday wants to buy into the AI boom — without overpaying
summary: CEO Carl Eschenbach is betting disciplined deals and new AI tools will help Workday ride the next big wave.

headline: Why CIOs and CFOs are becoming ‘attached at the hip’ as businesses make big AI investments
summary: Studies have shown that many generative AI pilots fail. That makes it critical for IT and finance leaders to align before placing any big AI bets.

raw.headline: Why CIOs and CFOs are becoming ‘attached at the hip’ as businesses make big AI investments

headline: Workday's agentic AI will save more time for your business: CEO
summary: Business manager platform Workday (WDAY) is the latest company to deploy agentic AI in a bid to better compete with artificial intelligence developer OpenAI's (OPAI.PVT) expansive toolbox of digital applications. Workday's array of new AI models will help automate and streamline contracts and sales agreements, among many other features. Workday CEO Carl Eschenbach sits down with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman and Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi to talk more about the company's suite of AI tools and its pricing model and credits for enterprise customers. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Workday Introduces New Custom AI Model Library to Power Smarter, Faster Contract Reviews
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the enterprise AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, today announced a new Custom AI Model Library for the Workday Contract Intelligence Agent, powered by Evisort. The library includes more than 120 pre-built AI models trained to identify key clauses, risks, line items, and terms in contracts — from HR agreements to vendor contracts to sales deals. By giving organizations access to these specialized models, Workday is enabling faster contract reviews,

headline: Spinnaker Support Bridges Delaware County’s SAP Support Needs as it Migrates to Workday
summary: DENVER, October 22, 2025--Spinnaker Support (Spinnaker), the Oracle, SAP and VMware software support specialist trusted by over 1,000 global clients, including many of the world’s leading banks, telcos and utility companies, today announced that it is providing Delaware County with SAP continuity maintenance support while it transitions to a Workday ERP solution. The agreement ensures Delaware County can seamlessly maintain and operate critical SAP ERP functions while migration to Workday is com

headline: Astrada to Bring Real-Time Expense Reporting into Workday
summary: Astrada, the unified API for transaction data, today announced a collaboration with Workday to bring real-time transaction credit card feeds into the Workday platform. Astrada's live transaction connectivity will combine with Workday's AI-powered platform to help organizations gain more accurate, immediate visibility into employee spend and streamlined expense reporting.

headline: Truist debuts One View Connect pilot, enabling multi-platform ERP banking for wholesale clients
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) today announced the launch of Truist One View Connect, an embedded banking solution that empowers finance teams to seamlessly manage payments and cash across diverse environments, dramatically reducing complexity and unlocking new levels of efficiency. Embedded natively in leading enterprise resource planning (ERP) platforms — including NetSuite, Sage Intacct, Workday and Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central — Truist One View Connect delivers a unified

headline: Should Flywire's (FLYW) Deeper Integration With Workday Student Influence Its Position in EdTech Payments?
summary: Flywire Corporation recently announced an expanded and certified integration with Workday Student, enabling higher education institutions to unify Flywire’s payments and Student Financial Software platform directly into Workday’s student information system. This collaboration allows institutions to offer streamlined, multilingual payment options and automated reconciliation, potentially reducing administrative work and payment inquiries by up to 40%. Let's explore how Flywire’s deeper...
